item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 2, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Geothermal power is a climate moon shot beneath our feet (97 points | 83 comments)
2. Smallpond – A lightweight data processing framework built on DuckDB and 3FS (106 points | 37 comments)
3. Speedrunners are vulnerability researchers, they just don't know it yet (140 points | 43 comments)
4. Hallucinations in code are the least dangerous form of LLM mistakes (49 points | 32 comments)
5. The Pentium contains a complicated circuit to multiply by three (137 points | 31 comments)
6. Matt's Script Archive (1995) (34 points | 10 comments)
7. API design note: Beware of adding an "Other" enum value (59 points | 36 comments)
8. Imec demonstrates electrical yield for 20nm lines High NA EUV single patterning (8 points | 1 comment)
9. Schools reviving shop class (51 points | 11 comments)
10. Turning my ESP32 into a DNS sinkhole to fight doomscrolling (26 points | 7 comments)
11. Verifiable science on modified PCR machine (26 points | 4 comments)
12. Why do we have both CSRF protection and CORS? (64 points | 38 comments)
13. olduse.net (84 points | 11 comments)
14. I struggled with Git, so I'm making a game to spare others the pain (99 points | 109 comments)
15. Raspberry Pi Pico audio player (102 points | 24 comments)
16. Distro (YC S24) is hiring a marketing lead in Palo Alto ( | hide)
17. New battery-free technology can power devices using ambient RF signals (54 points | 26 comments)
18. Show HN: Recommendarr – AI Driven Recommendations Based on Sonarr/Radarr Media (48 points | 19 comments)
19. Google does not want rights to things you do using Chrome (2008) (110 points | 50 comments)
20. When Professor Bryant Lin got cancer, he taught a class about it (59 points | 15 comments)
21. Effective Rust (2024) (119 points | 69 comments)
22. Stone tool analysis in Southeast Asia provides evidence of seafaring technology (16 points | 7 comments)
23. Show HN: Fast Transition from Firefox to Librewolf (23 points | 5 comments)
24. Rotors: A practical introduction for 3D graphics (2023) (6 points | discuss)
25. Towards a test suite for TOTP codes (55 points | 14 comments)
26. 2025 Hiring Pause (104 points | 68 comments)
27. Nvidia GPU on bare metal NixOS Kubernetes cluster explained (3 points | discuss)
28. Show HN: SafeHaven – A Minimal VPN Implementation in Go (62 points | 9 comments)
29. GPT-4.5: "Not a frontier model"? (133 points | 128 comments)
30. Show HN: I built a memory-safe web server in Rust (53 points | 45 comments)
